      • handle

        boolean handle(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf data)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles data received from the remote end.
        Parameters:
        data - Buffer containing data.
        Returns:
        "true" if the interceptor expects more data, "false" to uninstall the interceptor.

        java.lang.Exception
